h1.span: Indianola Community Schools are Closed through April 30th

span.a: Please Click Here for the Latest District Information on COVID-19

div.span: Welcome to Indianola Community School District!

h3.a: COVID-19 Ancillary Fund Provides $250 Assistance to Families

span.p: The Health Well Foundation is providing up to $250 assistance to families for delivered food, medication, diagnostics, transportation and telehealth as a result of COVID-19 risk or incidence. Please see the COVID-19 Ancillary Fund page for more information. Applications are…

h3.a: Parent Guide for PowerSchool Unified Classroom Class Pages

span.p: The Class Pages link, within PowerSchool Unified Classroom, is where the Learning Management System (LMS) side of PowerSchool is located. A learning management system is what teachers use to post information, assignments, and make tests online. As a…

a.span: Certainty in Uncertain Times A book I read once described modern life as “permanent white water.” The only white water rafting I’ve done was on a pretty tame stretch of river in Colorado with my family many......

I was fortunate enough this morning to stop into an American literature class where students were putting the finishing touches on their own “TED talks” to present as a semester project. TED, briefly, is a nonprofit group that......

Thanksgiving is on my mind a lot, more as a practice than a holiday, although it is a pretty awesome holiday. I enjoy all of the observances that have come to be associated with Thanksgiving except Black Friday......

div.script: <span class="evt-tag<%= " " + _.join(classes, " ") %>" data-evt-tag="true"<%= fixed ? " data-evt-tag-fixed=\"true\"" : "" %> <% _.forEach(data, function(value, key) { %><%= " data-" + key + "='" + value + "'" %><% }); %><%= fixed ? "" : " title=\"Remove this filter\"" %>> <%= label %><% if (!fixed) { %> ×<% } %>
